name: Texas Home Health of America, L.p.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Texas Home Health of America, L.p. is a Home Health provider based in Dallas, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $71.2M in Medicaid payments across 1.1M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $71.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
